commitMessage: @@@GEODE-6450: can use default SSL when invoking CMS on server (#3320)
@@@GEODE-6678: Remove singleton cache reference from ClusterManagementServiceProvider (#3496)

@@@* GEODE-6861: have create/delete/update return SimpleClusterManagementResult which does not need generics.

Co-authored-by: Joris Melchior <joris.melchior@gmail.com>

@@@Revert "* GEODE-6861: have create/delete/update return SimpleClusterManagementResult which does not need generics."

This reverts commit b3157c94

@@@GEODE-6861: separate static config object from runtime info in the Cl? (#3754)

Co-authored-by: Joris Melchior <joris.melchior@gmail.com>

* use ConfigRealizer to retrieve the runtime information for configuration on each member
* list result would return a List of Response object which has a configuration object and a list runtime objects
* use existing object for runtime member info and move them to geode-management module.

@@@GEODE-6897: refactor ClusterManagementResult into subclasses (#3793)

* GEODE-6897: refactoring of ClusterManagementResult into subclasses

@@@GEODE-7715: Introduce Transport and Config interfaces to ClusterManagementServiceBuilder (#4601)

This introduces several new interfaces to the `ClusterManagementService`. These are:

- `ClusterManagmentServiceTransport` which represents the message exchange between client and endpoint.
- `ClusterManagementServiceConnectionConfig` which is a data object and represents various properties required to establish a connection.

@@@GEODE-7752: Removed the current optionality on the ClusterManagementServiceBuilder. (#4650)

The Transport is not responsible to set the ConnectionConfig.
